The Qur’an researcher obtained what is in the breasts, that is, the collection of what is in the hearts of the designer, and it was shown like the core of the pulp from the scales, and its collection or the advantage of its goodness from evil; The thing was used to obtain something in the sense of its advantage from others as it is in the sea.The origin of the acquisition is the laxity of the scales, such as the laxity of gold from the stone of the host (P-220) and the righteousness of the grace and the specialization of what is in the hearts because it is the original for the wickedness of the With the intentions and the first of the thought was the last of the work, all of what he did is followed by him, so he indicates all the goodness and sophistication, and the son of the son of Ummar and the son of the son of the son Maadan: “He crossed” a building for the reaction, which is his guilt, glory and glory.Ibn Ya`mar and Nasr also read: “He got” a building for the acting, the light is the one who is the subject.
